name: EugeneOr
description: A game about what it literally means to be in our hometown, Eugene OR! In this game you are walking home in the middle of a storm, and you need to use your umbrella to keep dry in a typical Willamette Valley downpour! The game is controlled almost entirely with mouse, Click and drag to angle the umbrella, and press R on the keyboard to restart, S to go back to the start screen, and Q to quit the application
